name: BookmarkDownloader
short_description:
This program is used to download all of your bookmarked sites in the Chrome web browser. It downloads the web pages to your local machine, so that you can view them offline. It is only supported for Linux currently. It is a python file, so you must have python installed to run the program.

HOW TO RUN PROGRAM:
1. Place the BookmarkDownloader.py file in the directory you wish to download all of your bookmarks.
2. Run the program with "python BookmarkDownloader.py" from terminal.
3. If you want to re-download all bookmarks, then remove all of the URLs from "bookmarksMaster.txt"
summary: Download all of  your Chrome bookmarks to your local machine in Linux
